groom.name: Aromal
groom.bio: Born in the scenic village of Naduvil in the heart of Kannur, Aromal is a loving son and a professional who deeply values family traditions. A proud alumnus of St. Mary's EMHS, JNV Kannur, and Nirmala HSS Chemperi, he went on to earn his B.Tech Honours from Vimal Jyothi Engineering College. Professionally, he began his journey as a System Engineer at TCS and currently works as a Site Reliability Engineer at the AdTech startup, Kayzen. A true 'Jack of all trades,' Aromal has a curious mind and dabbles in a bit of everything. When he isn‚Äôt working, you can find him capturing moments through photography or exploring new roads on his bike. He looks forward to building a beautiful life ahead with the blessings of friends and family.

bride.name: Jesna
bride.bio: Born in Muscat but raised in the village of Meladoor, Thrissur, Jesna is a mix of calm vibes and an extroverted heart. After her school days at Holy Child and St. Antony‚Äôs Mala, she pursued her medical dreams at Govt Villupuram Medical College, Tamil Nadu. A true high-achiever, she has already cracked the UPSC, securing a position as a Railway Doctor‚Äîa testament to her dedication and brilliance. Currently, she is further specializing as a PG student in Anesthesia at Govt Medical College, Thrissur. To most, she comes across as calm and poised, but her inner circle knows her as a lively extrovert who loves a good laugh. She‚Äôs super ambitious about her career but stays deeply rooted in her family traditions. When she‚Äôs not navigating medical chaos, you‚Äôll find her dancing or in her garden. For Jesna, life is about balance‚Äîworking hard toward her goals while staying grounded in faith and family

wedding.title: Wedding Ceremony
wedding.description: We joyfully invite you to witness and celebrate our wedding

siteContent.meetTheCoupleDescription: Our story is made of little moments, shared laughter, and countless prayers. From strangers to best friends, and now partners for life, we step into this new journey hand in hand‚Äîguided by love and surrounded by those who mean the most to us.
siteContent.celebrationDescription: Every moment we share is a celebration of love and joy. We can't wait to create beautiful memories together with you.
siteContent.ctaDescription: We would be honored to have you celebrate this special day with us. Please RSVP by January 10th, 2026.
